item.title: How I Work
item.description: A basic description of my current working tools

item.title: KVM Tips
item.description: Some tips for interacting with KVM

I am a software engineer who focuses on cloud computing, distributed systems, and data science, though my interests cross into many areas across computing. I thrive in environments that involve collaborating and working towards solving creative problems. Currently I am working as a software engineer at Capital One helping to build technology used by developers across the company. I also enjoy studying how technology can interact with people and the surrounding world.
